params.data: Input to the `checkSignatures` function, which is of the format: < bytes32 msgHash, uint48 index of the totalStake corresponding to the dataStoreId in the 'totalStakeHistory' array of the BLSRegistryWithBomb uint32 numberOfNonSigners, uint256[numberOfSigners][4] pubkeys of nonsigners, uint32 apkIndex, uint256[4] apk, uint256[2] sigma >

params.blockNumber: is the block number in Ethereum for which the confirmation will consult total + operator stake amounts. -- must not be more than 'BLOCK_STALE_MEASURE' (defined in DataLayr) blocks in past
params.confirmer: is the address that must confirm the datastore
params.duration: for which the data has to be stored by the DataLayr operators. This is a quantized parameter that describes how many factors of DURATION_SCALE does this data blob needs to be stored. The quantization process comes from ease of implementation in DataLayrBombVerifier.sol.
params.feePayer: is the address that will be paying the fees for this datastore. check DataLayrPaymentManager for further details
params.header: is the summary of the data that is being asserted into DataLayr,  type DataStoreHeader struct {   KzgCommit      [64]byte   Degree         uint32    NumSys         uint32   NumPar         uint32   OrigDataSize   uint32    Disperser      [20]byte   LowDegreeProof [64]byte   }

returns._0: index The index in the array `dataStoreHashesForDurationAtTimestamp[duration][block.timestamp]` at which the DataStore's hash was stored.

stakeWithdrawalVerification(bytes,uint25.details: Function reverts if the verification fails.

DURATION_SCALE().notice: Unit of measure (in time) for the duration of DataStores

MAX_DATASTORE_DURATION().notice: The longest allowed duation of a DataStore, measured in `DURATION_SCALE`

collateralToken().notice: Collateral token used for placing collateral on challenges & payment commits

dataLayrPaymentManager().notice: contract used for handling payment challenges

freezeOperator(address).notice: Permissioned function that causes the ServiceManager to freeze the operator on EigenLayer, through a call to the Slasher contreact

getDataStoreHashesForDurationAtTimestamp.notice: Returns the hash of the `index`th DataStore with the specified `duration` at the specified UTC `timestamp`.

getNumDataStoresForDuration(uint8).notice: returns the number of data stores for the @param duration

latestTime().notice: Returns the `latestTime` until which operators must serve.

log2NumPowersOfTau().notice: number of layers in the root tree

numPowersOfTau().notice: number of leaves in the root tree

revokeSlashingAbility(address,uint32).notice: Permissioned function that causes the ServiceManager to revoke its ability to slash the operator on EigenLayer, through a call to the Slasher contreact

stakeWithdrawalVerification(bytes,uint25.notice: Verifies that a task for this middleware exists which was created *at or before* `initTimestamp` *AND* that expires *strictly prior to* the specified `unlockTime`.

taskNumber().notice: Returns the current 'taskNumber' for the middleware

verifyDataStoreMetadata(uint8,uint256,ui.notice: Checks that the hash of the `index`th DataStore with the specified `duration` at the specified UTC `timestamp` matches the supplied `metadata`. Returns 'true' if the metadata matches the hash, and 'false' otherwise.

documentation.text:
@param data Input to the `checkSignatures` function, which is of the format:
 <
 bytes32 msgHash,
 uint48 index of the totalStake corresponding to the dataStoreId in the 'totalStakeHistory' array of the BLSRegistryWithBomb
 uint32 numberOfNonSigners,
 uint256[numberOfSigners][4] pubkeys of nonsigners,
 uint32 apkIndex,
 uint256[4] apk,
 uint256[2] sigma
 >
@notice number of leaves in the root tree
@notice number of layers in the root tree
@notice Unit of measure (in time) for the duration of DataStores
@notice The longest allowed duation of a DataStore, measured in `DURATION_SCALE`
@notice Returns the hash of the `index`th DataStore with the specified `duration` at the specified UTC `timestamp`.
@notice returns the number of data stores for the @param duration
@notice Collateral token used for placing collateral on challenges & payment commits
@notice contract used for handling payment challenges

@notice Checks that the hash of the `index`th DataStore with the specified `duration` at the specified UTC `timestamp` matches the supplied `metadata`.
 Returns 'true' if the metadata matches the hash, and 'false' otherwise.
